channel.title: Angular SuperUI - Component Library Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, new components, and announcements from Angular SuperUI - the ultimate headless UI component library for Angular

item.title: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 - Major Release with 39+ Components
item.description:
We're excited to announce Angular SuperUI 2.0.0, our biggest release yet featuring 39+ production-ready components!

üéâ What's New

  • 39+ Components: Complete collection of headless UI components
  • Enhanced CLI: New 'ngsui' command for easier installation
  • Better TypeScript: Improved type safety and IntelliSense
  • Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all components
  • Performance: Tree-shakable, zero dependencies

üöÄ New Components

  • Rating - Interactive star rating component
  • Spinner - Loading indicators with multiple variants
  • Tabs - Tabbed interface with keyboard navigation
  • Textarea - Multi-line text input with auto-resize
  • Toast - Notification system with positioning
  • Tooltip - Hover and focus-triggered overlays

Install today: npm install -g ngsui

item.title: New Enhanced Calendar Component with Time Picker
item.description:
Our Calendar component just got a major upgrade! Now featuring integrated time picker, range selection with drag support, and enhanced accessibility.

‚ú® Features

  • Date range selection with intuitive drag support
  • Integrated time picker for complete date-time handling
  • Full accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1)

Perfect for booking systems, event planning, and scheduling applications.
